---
title: "r-data-exploration"
format: html
---


```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)

View(diamonds)

names(diamonds)

dim(diamonds)

summary(diamonds)

head(diamonds)

tail(diamonds)

skimr::skim(diamonds)

GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, y = carat)) +
  geom_point()

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
